title: 'Three Major Takeaways From This AI Summit...': Ashwini Vaishnaw At GBS 2026
description: India will host a major AI summit from February 16 to February 20, 2026, featuring over 15 heads of government and numerous CEOs. title: China’s ByteDance releases Doubao 2.0 AI chatbot
description: China’s ByteDance has rolled out its Doubao 2.0 chatbot, an upgrade of Doubao which is currently the country’s most widely used artificial intelligence app, according to QuestMobile, the company said on Saturday.
content:
BEIJING, Feb 14 (Reuters) - China’s ByteDance has rolled out its Doubao 2.0 chatbot, an upgrade of Doubao which is currently the country’s most widely used artificial intelligence app, according to QuestMobile, the company said on Saturday.
